articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The BBC has established the Chancellor left the financial institution nine months earlier than she states in her LinkedIn profile.
articles.title: Rachel Reeves's CV exaggerated time at Bank of England

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: BBC News has learnt that there was an expenses investigation into Rachel Reeves, and two other senior managers, when she worked at HBOS.
articles.title: The Chancellor and her expenses before she became an MP

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: A major operation is under way in the Dachauer Strasse area, police said.
articles.title: Several injured after vehicle drives into crowd in Munich

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: A total of 48% forces found drivers going more than three times the 30mph limit, the RAC says.
articles.title: Police catching motorists doing 90mph on 30mph roads

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: It's the first time mortgage deals with rates below 4% have been available since November.
articles.title: Santander and Barclays cut mortgage rates below 4% as market picks up.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Thai Prime Minister Paetongtarn Shinawatra has pledged to close scam centres along the Thai-Myanmar border.
articles.title: Hundreds of foreigners freed from Myanmar's scam centres

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Thursday's front pages are dominated by a phone call between Donald Trump and Vladimir Putin.
articles.title: Newspaper headlines: Putin 'peace talks' and a 'game of no halves'

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: An investigation reveals a crime group having to adapt to modernity and displaying a nostalgia for past ambitions.
articles.title: Sicily's gangsters forced to modernise but complain they can't get the staff

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Andrew Malkinson's lawyer says an initial compensation payment could exempt him from social housing.
articles.title: Andrew Malkinson: Wrongly jailed man 'at risk of losing housing'

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Amelia Price is calling for a law change so non-harassment orders are mandatory in certain domestic abuse-related cases.
articles.title: I am less protected after my rapist's conviction
